00001 #include <QApplication>
00002 #include <QDebug>
00003 #include <QFrame>
00004 #include <QHBoxLayout>
00005 #include <marble/MarbleNavigator.h>
00006 #include <marble/MarbleWidget.h>
00007  
00008 using namespace Marble;
00009  
00010 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00011 {
00012     QApplication app(argc,argv);
00013 
00014     QWidget *mainWindow = new QWidget();
00015     QHBoxLayout *hbox = new QHBoxLayout();
00016 
00017     MarbleNavigator *navigator = new MarbleNavigator(mainWindow);
00018     MarbleWidget *mapWidget = new MarbleWidget(mainWindow);
00019  
00020     mapWidget->setMapThemeId("earth/openstreetmap/openstreetmap.dgml");
00021     mapWidget->setDownloadUrl("http://tiles.openstreetmap.com");
00022 
00023     //Connect signals
00024     QObject::connect( navigator, SIGNAL( goHome() ), mapWidget, SLOT( goHome() ) );
00025     QObject::connect( navigator, SIGNAL( zoomIn() ), mapWidget, SLOT( zoomIn() ) );
00026     QObject::connect( navigator, SIGNAL( zoomOut() ), mapWidget, SLOT( zoomOut() ) );
00027     QObject::connect( navigator, SIGNAL( zoomChanged( int ) ), mapWidget, SLOT( zoomView( int ) ) );
00028     QObject::connect( navigator, SIGNAL( moveLeft() ), mapWidget, SLOT( moveLeft() ) );
00029     QObject::connect( navigator, SIGNAL( moveRight() ), mapWidget, SLOT( moveRight() ) );
00030     QObject::connect( navigator, SIGNAL( moveUp() ), mapWidget, SLOT( moveUp() ) );
00031     QObject::connect( navigator, SIGNAL( moveDown() ), mapWidget, SLOT( moveDown() ) );
00032     QObject::connect( mapWidget, SIGNAL( zoomChanged( int ) ), navigator, SLOT( changeZoom( int ) ) );
00033 
00034     hbox->addWidget( navigator );
00035     hbox->addWidget( mapWidget );
00036     mainWindow->setLayout( hbox );
00037     mainWindow->show();
00038 
00039     //Drawing test bit
00040     /*
